title: hybrid choice
extract: "Hybrid security” is a generic term used to describe a security that combines elements of debt securities and equity securities. ... However, they also have equity-like features that can mean they may provide a higher rate of return than regular debt securities.
extract_html: "Hybrid security” is a generic term used to describe a security that combines elements of debt securities and equity securities. ... However, they also have equity-like features that can mean they may provide a higher rate of return than regular debt securities.
